attributes.long-description:
An American TV crew has arrived in Japan to film an expose on the legend of the “vanished village,” only to find themselves caught in a deadly series of events. Intense graphics, realistic character animation, and a gritty film-like graphical presentation add to the horror of Siren: Blood Curse.

This bundle contains episodes 9-12. Requires Bundle 1 to play. 

Get ready for the intense climax as paths cross and horrible truths are revealed in the final four episodes. Armed with knowledge and skills from previous episodes, face the truth behind the horrors of Hanuda village and the destiny that awaits them all.  
Game Features:
- Complex story spread across 12 dramatic separate episodes with seven playable characters
- Unique sight jack system lets you see exactly what your enemies see
- Sneak past the deadly Shibito or take them head on with over 50 kinds of weapons, each with unique fatal finishing moves
- Archive system lets player unlock a variety of story clues and information
attributes.name: SIREN: Blood Curse Bundle 3
